maml:description.maml:para: Creates configuration object for virtual machine automatic patching
Creates configuration object for virtual machine automatic patching

Enables or disables automated patching for the virtual machine. Enabling automated patching will put Windows Update into interactive mode. Disabling automated patching does not changes Windows Update settings.
Specifies the day of the week when updates should be installed. Can be specified any single day of the week or every day.
Specifies the hour of the day when maintenance window starts. This time defines when updates start installing. Rounded to the hour.

Specifies the duration of the maintenance window. Automated patching will avoid performing an action that can impact a machine availability outside of that window. Only 30 minutes increments are allowed.
Defines if Important updates should be included.
Specifies the day of the week when updates should be installed. Can be specified any single day of the week or every day.

Enables or disables automated patching for the virtual machine. Enabling automated patching will put Windows Update into interactive mode. Disabling automated patching does not changes Windows Update settings.
Specifies the hour of the day when maintenance window starts. This time defines when updates start installing.

Specifies the duration of the maintenance window. Automated patching will avoid performing an action that can impact a machine availability outside of that window. Only 30 minutes increments are allowed.
Defines if important updates should be included.
Returns object contains settings for automated patching.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
C:\PS> $aps = New-AzureVMSqlServerAutoPatchingConfig -Enable -DayOfWeek "Thursday" -MaintenanceWindowStartingHour 11 -MaintenanceWindowDuration 120 -PatchCategory "Important"
PS C:\> $aps Enable : True DayOfWeek : Thursday MaintenanceWindowStartingHour : 11 MaintenanceWindowDuration : 120 PatchCategory : Important

dev:remarks.maml:para: This command creates configuration object that can be used to configure automatic patching using Set-AzureVMSqlServerExtension

maml:description.maml:para: Creates configuration object for SQL Server Automatic Backup
Creates configuration object for SQL Server automatic backup

Enables or disables automated backup for the SQL Server Virtual Machine. Enabling automated backup will set a backup schedule for all of your existing and new databases. This will update your Managed Backup settings to follow this schedule.
Specifies the storage account to be used to store backups. Default will be storage account associated with the SQL Server VM.
Backup Retention period in days. 1 day minimum, 30 day maximum. Default is 30 days.
Enable backup encryption. If enabled, the certificate will be automatically generated and stored in the same storage account as the backups, and password protected.
Password to encrypt the certificate that is used to perform SQL Server encrypted backups

Enables or disables automated backup for the SQL Server Virtual Machine. Enabling automated backup will set a backup schedule for all of your existing and new databases. This will update your Managed Backup settings to follow this schedule.
Enable backup encryption. If enabled, the certificate will be automatically generated and stored in the same storage account as the backups, and password protected.
Password to encrypt the certificate that is used to perform SQL Server encrypted backups
Backup Retention period in days. 1 day minimum, 30 day maximum. Default is 30 days.
Specifies the storage account to be used to store backups. Default will be storage account associated with the SQL Server VM.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
$abs = New-AzureVMSqlServerAutoBackupConfig -Enable -RetentionPeriod 10 -StorageUri $storageUrl -StorageKey $storageAccountKeySecure
Enable : True EnableEncryption : False RetentionPeriodInDays : 10

dev:remarks.maml:para: Creates a auto-backup config object by specifying storage uri and account key.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 2 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
$abs = New-AzureVMSqlServerAutoBackupConfig -StorageContext $storageContext -Enable -RetentionPeriod 10
Enable : True EnableEncryption : False RetentionPeriodInDays : 10

dev:remarks.maml:para: Creates an auto-backup config object by specifying Storage context.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 3 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
$abs = New-AzureVMSqlServerAutoBackupConfig -StorageContext $storageContext -Enable -RetentionPeriod 10 -EnableEncryption -CertificatePassword $certPasswd
Enable : True EnableEncryption : True RetentionPeriodInDays : 10

dev:remarks.maml:para: Creates an auto-backup config object by specifying Storage context and enabling encryption option with password.
